long: I helped organize HackUMass X, a student-led hackathon at UMass Amherst, which happened the weekend of Nov 11-13, 2022!
I volunteered to do research over the winter 2022-2023 session for CICS's Undergraduate Research Volunteer (URV) program and presented our research poster today!
Published freshman-faq, a comprehensive list on FAQ for incoming freshmen and transfer students to UMass Amherst.
Published urv, a blogpost detailing the research I did as part of the URV program (Ensuring Privacy at Edge Nodes in a Network).
Published picoctf, a short blogpost on starting basic CTF challenges on PicoCTF.
Published hello-world, a short blogpost on the new site revamp.
Published obsidian-enjoyer, a short blogpost about using Obsidian, a popular text editor.
Participated in the annual Rescuelab Hackathon hosted by the UMass Amherst Infosec/Cybersecurity Institute.
Published rescuelab-hackathon, a blogpost about the LinkedIn scraper I made as part of Rescuelab Hackathon 2023.
I helped organize HackUMass XI, a student-led hackathon at UMass Amherst, which happened the weekend of Nov 10-12, 2023 -- this time as the co-director!
Published hackumass-xi, a blogpost on how we organized HackUMass XI and how the event went.
Published ++2023;, a blogpost on what skills I want to improve on in the new year!
I competed in the Northeast Collegiate Cyber Defense Competition (CCDC) 2024!

short: awarded CICS Certificate of Recognition in Student Leadership
long: I was awarded a Certificate of Recognition in Student Leadership Award for my role in the CICS student organizations HackUMass and Cybersecurity Club.

short: awarded a UMass Senior Leadership Award
long: I was awarded a UMass Senior Leadership Award for CICS from Dean Laura Haas, an award that is only granted to one student from the graduating Senior class for each college.

I started as a masters student (in computer science) at UMass Amherst!
